It should be noted that there was never a commercial release called the "Tarantino Cut." This term is used by fans of the movie to refer to a series of fan edits to the movie released on the internet which attempted to restore the movie to something closer to the writer's original vision in the screenplay. 

I'm not familiar enough with True Romance to determine whether this is in fact a fan edit with the scenes no longer appearing in chronological order, or rather a theatrical, special or director's cut of the movie.

As one of the tags for this torrent is "Tarantino Cut" while others are "Special Edition", "Blu Ray" and the like, one can only assume that this torrent is mislabeled, either in title or tags.
